languages.text: "В Семь Преисподних такие дары!" {n}Воин взрывается гневным криком.{/n} "Чего стоит доблесть неумирающего?! В чем подвиг деяний того, кем брезгует смерть?! Когда наступит Время Волка, и павшие братья мои выйдут на последнюю битву, где буду я?! Один сидеть в чертоге Клыка у потухшего очага?"

"A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth? Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting alone in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"
languages.original_text: "В Семь Преисподних такие дары!" {n}Воин взрывается гневным криком.{/n} "Чего стоит доблесть неумирающего?! В чем подвиг деяний того, кем брезгует смерть?! Когда наступит Время Волка, и павшие братья мои выйдут на последнюю битву, где буду я?! Один сидеть в чертоге Клыка у потухшего очага?"

Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting along in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting along in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting along in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

"A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth? Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting along in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

languages.text: “恐怕是来自七重地狱的祝福吧！”{n}乌尔法愤怒地咆哮起来。{/n}“如果战士不会死亡，那他的勇气还有什么价值？不愿接纳死亡的人，还能赢得什么功绩？群狼之刻到来时，我那些倒下的兄弟们会加入最后的大战，而我又会在什么地方？一个人呆在狼牙圣殿，坐在早已熄灭的火堆旁边吗？”
languages.original_text: "A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth? Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting alone in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

traits.locale_text: “恐怕是来自七重地狱的祝福吧！”{n}乌尔法愤怒地咆哮起来。{/n}“如果战士不会死亡，那他的勇气还有什么价值？不愿接纳死亡的人，还能赢得什么功绩？群狼之刻到来时，我那些倒下的兄弟们会加入最后的大战，而我又会在什么地方？一个人呆在狼牙圣殿，坐在早已熄灭的火堆旁边吗？”

languages.text: «¡Sería un regalo salido de los Siete Infiernos!». {n}Ulfar brama, furioso.{/n} «¿Qué valor tiene el coraje de un guerrero que no puede morir? ¿Qué grandeza tienen las hazañas de alguien que rehúye la muerte? Cuando llegue la Hora Loba y mis hermanos caídos marchen al combate, ¿dónde estaré yo? ¿Sentado solo en el Colmillo, junto a una hoguera apagada hace mucho?».
languages.original_text: "A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth? Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting alone in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sería un regalo salido de los Siete Infiernos!». {n}Ulfar brama, furioso.{/n} «¿Qué valor tiene el coraje de un guerrero que no puede morir? ¿Qué grandeza tienen las hazañas de alguien que rehúye la muerte? Cuando llegue la Hora Loba y mis hermanos caídos marchen al combate, ¿dónde estaré yo? ¿Sentado solo en el Colmillo, junto a una hoguera apagada hace mucho?».

languages.text: 「七獄からの贈り物だ！」{n}ウルファーは怒りに燃えている。{/n}「死なない戦士の勇猛敢闘の誓いに何の価値がある？死を恐れる者の功績のどこに偉大さがあるというのか？ウルフタイムがやってきて、倒れた兄弟たちが最後の戦いに進軍するとき、俺はどこにいるのだろう？<牙城>の中で、とうの昔に消えた火のそばに座っているのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth? Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting alone in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

traits.locale_text: 「七獄からの贈り物だ！」{n}ウルファーは怒りに燃えている。{/n}「死なない戦士の勇猛敢闘の誓いに何の価値がある？死を恐れる者の功績のどこに偉大さがあるというのか？ウルフタイムがやってきて、倒れた兄弟たちが最後の戦いに進軍するとき、俺はどこにいるのだろう？<牙城>の中で、とうの昔に消えた火のそばに座っているのだろうか？」

languages.text: "Ein Geschenk aus den Sieben Höllen!", {n}bellt Ulfar wütend.{/n} "Was ist die Tugend eines todlosen Kriegers schon wert? Was ist an den Taten eines Kriegers zu bewundern, der dem Tod aus dem Weg geht? Wenn die Zeit des Wolfes kommt und meine gefallenen Brüder in die letzte Schlacht ziehen, wo werde ich dann sein? Soll ich im Reißzahn allein an einem Feuer sitzen, das längst erloschen ist?"
languages.original_text: "A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth? Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting alone in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Geschenk aus den Sieben Höllen!", {n}bellt Ulfar wütend.{/n} "Was ist die Tugend eines todlosen Kriegers schon wert? Was ist an den Taten eines Kriegers zu bewundern, der dem Tod aus dem Weg geht? Wenn die Zeit des Wolfes kommt und meine gefallenen Brüder in die letzte Schlacht ziehen, wo werde ich dann sein? Soll ich im Reißzahn allein an einem Feuer sitzen, das längst erloschen ist?"

languages.text: « Un don venu tout droit des Sept Enfers ! » {n}Ulfar pousse un rugissement furieux.{/n} « Quelle valeur peut bien avoir un guerrier immortel ? Quel prestige valent les exploits de quelqu'un qui recule devant la mort ? Lorsque l'Heure du Loup arrivera et que mes frères défunts se joindront à l'ultime bataille, où serai-je donc ? Assis seul dans le Croc, près des braises mortes d'un feu éteint depuis longtemps ? »
languages.original_text: "A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth? Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting alone in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

traits.locale_text: « Un don venu tout droit des Sept Enfers ! » {n}Ulfar pousse un rugissement furieux.{/n} « Quelle valeur peut bien avoir un guerrier immortel ? Quel prestige valent les exploits de quelqu'un qui recule devant la mort ? Lorsque l'Heure du Loup arrivera et que mes frères défunts se joindront à l'ultime bataille, où serai-je donc ? Assis seul dans le Croc, près des braises mortes d'un feu éteint depuis longtemps ? »

languages.original_text: "A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth? Where is greatness in the exploits of one who shrinks from death? When the Wolf Time comes and my fallen brothers march into the final battle, where will I be? Sitting along in the Fang beside a fire that went out long ago?"

languages.text: "Yerin Yedi Kat Altı'ndan gelme bir armağan!" {n}Ulfar sinirle haykırıyor.{/n} "Ölümsüz bir savaşçının yiğitliği neye yarar? Ölümden kaçan birinin maceraları nasıl yüce olabilir? Kurt Zamanı gelip de kardeşlerim son savaşa yürüdüğünde ben nerede olacağım? Diş'te uzun zaman önce sönmüş bir ateşin küllerine mi bakacağım?"
languages.original_text: "A gift straight from the Seven Hells!" {n}Ulfar bellows angrily.{/n} "What is the valour of a deathless warrior worth?
